ValidationRule.description: Ensures that the user can only select the Accepted and Declined stage.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( OR(RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Gift_In_Kind', RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Cause', RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Endowment', RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Pledge'), ISCHANGED(Stage__c), ISPICKVAL( PRIORVALUE(Stage__c) ,'Proposed'), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Stage__c,'Accepted')), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Stage__c,'Declined')) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You can only select Accepted or Declined stage.
